mapper.select: select * from databank order by regdate desc
mapper.insert: insert into databank (datano, dtitle, dcontent, dposter, dfilename, dview, regdate) values ((select nvl(max(datano)+1, 1) from databank), #{dtitle }, #{dcontent }, #{dposter }, #{dfilename }, #{dview }, sysdate)
mapper.update: update databank set dtitle=#{dtitle }, dcontent=#{dcontent }, dposter=#{dposter }, dfilename=#{dfilename } where datano=#{datano }
